column1: Kata Robata////Came here for my birthday dinner with my family! My brother and I had the omakase. Unfortunately
column2: since there were five of us
column3: we had to sit at a table and not the sushi bar. I'm the total sushi bar type
column4: but a "Bye Felicia" to my family for my birthday seemed a bit rude... especially since they were paying LOL.
